author: psmith

wouldn't display it's selected status.  Bizarre.
Also ensured that if the Root Logger is selected, the FocusOn action
Expand All/Collapse All actions arenow available from any node in the tree

author: psmith
msg: When the Event Detail panel is hidden, also hide the OneTouchExpandable feature
as it's not relevant while the detail panel is hidden.  This is consistent

author: psmith
msg: Changed the Detial panel layout selector popup menu to use Radio buttons.
Also added a couple of PropertyChange events so that the Event
detail pane Updating class can be immediately notified when the layout
changes and render immediately.  Prior to this it required the selected
table row to change before the layout change appeared to occur.
